data_type: information about use of on premise product
text:
Data Usage Programs

Broadcom collects information about customer organizations' use of our on-premise products and hosted services for a variety of purposes such as improving our products and services.
The Privacy Notices for Candidates describe how Broadcom collects, stores, uses and discloses personal data of job applicants during the recruitment process in the applicable regions and countries.
The Privacy Notice and Policy describes how we collect, use and disclose personal data for Broadcom's business purposes.
